receipts.title: Receipt Upload
receipts.description: Snap or upload a photo of your receipt for instant OCR processing.
receipts.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to upload

receiptEdit.title: Edit Receipt
receiptEdit.description: Update the vendor name, amount, date, and category for this receipt. You can choose from suggested categories or create your own.
receiptEdit.vendorHint: Choose from suggestions or type your own
receiptEdit.categoryHint: Choose from suggestions or type your own

deadlines.title: Tax Deadlines
deadlines.description: Track your MVA and Forskuddsskatt payment deadlines

healthCheck.title: Tax Health Check
healthCheck.projectedConflictSubtitle: Based on your current profit, we project your annual profit will be {projected} NOK.
healthCheck.recommendation: We recommend increasing your annual prepaid tax by {amount} NOK to avoid a back-tax penalty next year.
healthCheck.recommendationDecrease: You are projected to pay more tax than required. You can decrease your annual prepaid tax by {amount} NOK to improve cash flow.
healthCheck.onTrackSubtitle: Your tax plan matches your projected earnings perfectly.
healthCheck.underEarningSubtitle: Based on your YTD profit, we project your annual profit will be {projected} NOK.
healthCheck.setupRequiredSubtitle: Enter your expected profit in settings to enable real-time monitoring.

calculator.grossIncomeDescription: Enter your gross income for this transaction.
calculator.profitDescription: This is yours to keep after taxes.
calculator.mvaThresholdDescription: Your total income has crossed 50,000 NOK. In Norway, this means you are now liable for MVA (VAT). You must register your business in the MVA Register immediately.
calculator.mvaGuideStep1: 1. Send your invoice as usual (without MVA for now).
calculator.mvaGuideStep2: 2. Go to Altinn/Skatteetaten and apply for MVA registration.
calculator.mvaGuideStep3: 3. Once approved, you must start adding 25% MVA to all future invoices.
calculator.mvaReportDescription: Summary for your bi-monthly MVA return to Skatteetaten.
calculator.upgradeToUseCurrency: Upgrade to Pro to record income in USD, EUR, and more with live exchange rates.
calculator.fallbackNotice: We couldn't reach Norges Bank for live rates. Using an estimated approximate rate instead.

taxSync.title: Tax Configuration
taxSync.description: Set manually or scan your "Skattekort" PDF locally.
taxSync.note: Note: All PDF processing stays in your browser. We never see your documents.
taxSync.detected: Detected {rate}% from PDF! Click save to confirm.
taxSync.detectedMulti: Detected {rate}% tax rate and {salary} NOK in external salary! Click save to confirm.
taxSync.notFound: Could not find tax rate in this PDF. Please enter it manually.
taxSync.readFailed: Failed to read PDF locally. Please enter tax rate manually.
taxSync.invalidRate: Please enter a valid tax rate.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage your account preferences and security.
settingsPage.defaultLocaleDescription: Choose your preferred language for when you log in.
settingsPage.businessDescription: Manage your business status and tax context.
settingsPage.mvaDescription: Enable this if your business is registered in the MVA Register.
settingsPage.prepaidDetected: Detected {amount} NOK in prepaid tax! Click save to apply.
settingsPage.prepaidNotFound: No amount found in PDF. Please enter manually.

reminderSettings.title: Deadlines & Reminders
reminderSettings.description: Choose how and when you want to be reminded about important tax deadlines.
reminderSettings.pushDescription: Get browser alerts when a deadline is approaching.
reminderSettings.leadDaysDescription: How many days before the deadline should we remind you?

deductions.title: Deduction Optimizer
deductions.description: Unlock extra tax savings with standard Norwegian ENK deductions.
deductions.homeOfficeDesc: Work from a dedicated room at home? You can claim ~{amount} NOK/year.
deductions.mileageDesc: Drive your personal car for business? Deduct per kilometer.
deductions.savingsDesc: By claiming these deductions, you reduce your taxable profit by {amount} NOK.
deductions.receiptNote: Note: Actual receipts (like internet) are already deducted in your 'Safe to Spend' logic.

taxInsights.title: AI Tax Assistant
taxInsights.privacy: Privacy: Local scanning in browser â€¢ No data leaves your machine

journal.title: Transaction Journal
journal.description: A chronological record of all recorded income and expenses. Use this to review or delete mistakes.
journal.exportUpgrade: Upgrade to Pro for unlimited exports
journal.noTransactions: No transactions found for this period.
journal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This will automatically adjust your year-to-date totals.
journal.deleteSuccess: Transaction deleted and YTD totals updated.

cfo.performanceDesc: Monthly breakdown of income vs. profit.
cfo.burdenDesc: Focus strictly on business economy. External salaries are excluded.
cfo.expenseDesc: Top spending categories for the current year.
cfo.preCheckDesc: Map your business values directly to the official Tax Return form.

legal.disclaimerText: ENK Pilot is a decision-support tool provided 'as-is' for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional accounting, tax, or legal advice. By using this service, you acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for your own financial decisions and tax compliance. The developer(s) of ENK Pilot assume zero liability for any errors, omissions, financial losses, or tax penalties resulting from the use of this software, nor for any service disruptions or data inaccuracies. Always verify calculations with a certified professional and officially cross-check with Skatteetaten before filing.
legal.footerNote: Educational tool only. Not professional advice.
legal.legalFootnote: Educational decision-support tool. Not professional tax advice. User assumes 100% financial and legal responsibility for all filings.

pricing.title: Upgrade to Pro
pricing.description: Unlock international currencies, audit-ready exports, and smart tax insight.
pricing.foundingPerks: Founding Badge, Priority Feature Requests, Beta Access
